TimberHearth.title: Timber Hearth Locations (13/41)
TimberHearth.tooltip: Includes main planet and the Attlerock

BrittleHollow.title: Brittle Hollow Locations (13/94)
BrittleHollow.tooltip: Includes main planet and White Hole Station

GiantsDeep.title: Giant's Deep Locations (10/43)
GiantsDeep.tooltip: Includes every island, the core, and the Orbital Probe Cannon

DarkBramble.title: Dark Bramble Locations (4/10)
DarkBramble.tooltip: Each location is at an obvious point of interest that you need to leave your ship

Interloper.title: Interloper Locations (2/10)
Interloper.tooltip: Includes both outside and inside locations, will be impossible to reach once consumed by the sun

DreamWorldStealth.title: DLC: Sub-Area Lights Out (4/23)
DreamWorldStealth.tooltip: Requires Echoes of the Eye. Not for the faint of heart.

HardMode.title: Obscure/Difficult Locations (5/13)
HardMode.tooltip: Includes difficult locations, or locations only the truest of Outer Wilds fans know of.

Addons.title: Addon Locations
Addons.tooltip: If another mod has been made to support Outer Relics, their spawn locations will become available. It is up to the addon creator to provide customization options.

SingleMode.title: One Key Max Per Location
SingleMode.tooltip: Each location can only contain one key. Turn this off to allow multiple keys to appear in one location.

Hints.tooltip: Select how many of your hints will be vague, only telling you part of the location, vs. how many will tell you exactly where to go. Disabled makes all hints useless

UselessHintChance.tooltip: Select the chance that a hint will be a joke statement rather than tell you where an item is. This does not generate misleading hints.

LoopHints.tooltip: At the beginning of a loop, you'll be given a hint for where a key you haven't obtained is. Choose how many loops you must be into the run before these start appearing. Select 0 to disable.

StatMusic.title: Stat Screen Music
StatMusic.tooltip: A custom song plays at the end of a run when your stats are displayed. However, if you find this distracting or immersion-breaking, you can turn it off.

Debug.title: Dev Mode
Debug.tooltip: Enables the ability to create placement info for addons, and adds a lot more debug information to the console.

ModName.title: Mod Folder Name
ModName.tooltip: Want to add support for Outer Relics in your own mod? Insert the full name of your mod here (i.e. Gamewyrm.OuterRelics) and placement and hint files will automatically be put in your mod's folder

DryMode.title: Dry Runs
DryMode.tooltip: When starting a new run, will generate a spoiler log with the given seed, but will not actually start a run or affect your save data
